description: Sennheiser PMX70 Sport Line Stereo Neckband Headphones Features a patented ultra-lightweight, flexible construction, an ergonomic neckband, and a transducer system that is positioned vertically (turned 90 degrees) in the ear, the PMX70 offers an extra secure fit for optimum comfort and stability while avoiding interference with your movements.
title: Sennheiser PMX 70 Sport Earbud Line Stereo Neckband Headphone (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
